entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
